original_text: Jonathan and Ahimaaz were staying at En Rogel. They did not go into the city because they did not want anyone to see them there. So a female servant would take messages to them. Then they would take the messages to King David.
korean_text: 그 때에 요나단과 아히마아스가 사람이 볼까 두려워하여 감히 성에 들어가지 못하고 에느로겔 가에 머물고 어떤 여종은 그들에게 나와서 말하고 그들은 가서 다윗 왕에게 알리더니

sentences.original_text: Jonathan and Ahimaaz were staying at En Rogel
They did not go into the city
because they did not want anyone to see them there
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 거기서 누군가 자신들을 보는 것을 원하지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: So a female servant would take messages to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여종이 그들에게 소식을 가져다주곤 했다

sentences.original_text: Then they would take the messages to King David
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 그들은 그 소식을 다윗 왕에게 가져다주곤 했다
